projects.title: Handwashing Station Installation
projects.description: Construction and installation of durable handwashing stations with multiple faucets to promote proper hygiene practices among students.

projects.title: School Ground Maintenance
projects.description: Regular maintenance and beautification of school grounds including recycling initiatives and proper waste management practices.

projects.title: Facility Construction
projects.description: Building and improving sanitation facilities using durable materials and proper construction techniques for long-term sustainability.

testimonials.quote: With KalinisAralan's help, we've installed proper toilets and handwashing stations. Absenteeism has dropped by 30% since the facilities were completed.
testimonials.author: Maria Santos

testimonials.quote: The sanitation project has transformed our school environment. Our students now have dignity and privacy when using school facilities.
testimonials.author: Juan Reyes

testimonials.quote: As a student, I'm happy that we now have clean toilets and places to wash our hands. I don't worry about getting sick anymore.
testimonials.author: Elena Magsaysay

hero.title: Transforming School Sanitation in the Philippines
hero.description: KalinisAralan documents and shares Baliwag North Central School's successful sanitation practices while enabling support for more schools to implement better facilities for their students.

approach.title: Creating Model School Sanitation
approach.description: KalinisAralan combines documentation of effective sanitation practices with a platform for support, creating a sustainable model that both shares knowledge and enables improvement of facilities across Philippine public schools.
features: Documenting and sharing effective sanitation practices
Enabling knowledge and resource sharing between schools

process.title: How KalinisAralan Works
process.subtitle: THE PROCESS
process.description: Our initiative improves school sanitation in three simple steps

steps.title: Document
steps.description: We document successful sanitation practices from our model school

steps.title: Share
steps.description: We share these practices through our platform and workshops

steps.title: Support
steps.description: We enable support for schools to implement these practices

featuredProjects.title: Featured Initiativessss
featuredProjects.subtitle: OUR SCHOOL PARTNER'S PROJECTS
featuredProjects.description: Explore our ongoing and completed sanitation projects at our partner school

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: KalinisAralan aims to document and share effective school sanitation practices through our partner school, while enabling support mechanisms for other public schools across the Philippines to implement similar systems.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: We envision a network of Philippine public schools implementing effective sanitation practices through knowledge sharing and mutual support, creating healthier learning environments for all students.

story.title: Our Story
paragraphs: In 2025, KalinisAralan was established as a collaborative project with our partner school, Baliwag North Central School, to document their effective sanitation practices and create a platform that enables both knowledge sharing and support mechanisms for other public schools.

Through our documentation work and support initiatives, we aim to create a comprehensive digital platform that not only highlights successful practices but also facilitates partnerships and resources to help other schools improve their facilities.

strategies.title: Documentation & Support
strategies.description: We thoroughly document our partner school's practices while identifying opportunities for support and collaboration between schools to improve sanitation facilities.

strategies.title: Digital Platform
strategies.description: Our platform serves as both a knowledge hub and a connection point, enabling schools to learn from successful practices and access support for implementation.

strategies.title: Community Building
strategies.description: We facilitate knowledge sharing and support networks between schools, creating a community committed to improving sanitation standards through collaboration.

team.title: Our Team
team.description: Meet the dedicated team behind KalinisAralan's mission to document and share effective school sanitation practices.

practices.title: Regular Cleaning Schedule
practices.description: Daily cleaning schedule implemented by the school maintenance staff
practices.fullDescription: The school maintains cleanliness through a structured daily schedule: Morning inspection (6:30 AM), After-recess cleanup (10:00 AM), Post-lunch maintenance (1:30 PM), and End-day thorough cleaning (4:30 PM). This systematic approach ensures facilities remain clean throughout the school day.

practices.title: Student Cleanliness Program
practices.description: Weekly student assignments for basic facility maintenance
practices.fullDescription: Each section has assigned cleaning duties on rotation. Students handle basic tasks like keeping the sink areas dry, ensuring proper tissue disposal, and reporting any maintenance issues to teachers. This program builds student responsibility while maintaining facility cleanliness.

practices.title: Supply Management
practices.description: Monthly inventory system for cleaning materials
practices.fullDescription: The school maintains a monthly inventory of cleaning supplies including tissue paper, hand soap, and cleaning agents. The admin staff tracks usage patterns and ensures timely restocking. This prevents shortages and maintains consistent facility cleanliness.

practices.title: Facility Maintenance Checklist
practices.description: Daily inspection and maintenance verification system
practices.fullDescription: Maintenance staff uses a detailed checklist covering all facility areas: functioning water supply, clean toilet bowls, adequate lighting, proper drainage, and ventilation. Issues are immediately reported to the administration for quick resolution.

practices.title: Parent-Teacher Collaboration
practices.description: Monthly meetings for facility maintenance planning
practices.fullDescription: The PTA actively participates in facility maintenance through monthly meetings where they discuss maintenance needs, contribute to supply procurement, and organize quarterly general cleaning activities involving parents and teachers.

practices.title: Basic Repairs System
practices.description: Immediate response protocol for minor facility issues
practices.fullDescription: The school has a designated maintenance team that handles basic repairs like fixing leaky faucets, unclogging drains, and replacing broken fixtures. This quick-response system prevents small issues from becoming major problems.

practices.title: Sanitation Awareness Campaign
practices.description: Educational programs promoting hygiene and cleanliness
practices.fullDescription: The school conducts monthly workshops and poster campaigns to educate students on proper hygiene practices, including handwashing techniques, waste segregation, and maintaining clean facilities. These initiatives foster a culture of cleanliness among students.

practices.title: Community Clean-up Drive
practices.fullDescription: The school organizes quarterly clean-up drives involving students, teachers, parents, and local community members. These events focus on maintaining both school facilities and surrounding areas, promoting community engagement in sanitation efforts.
